Backtest Comparison¶

class finmarketpy.backtest.backtestcomparison.BacktestComparison(models, ref_index=0, labels=None)¶

Compares different backtest TradingModels Each model must have already been run

CHART_SOURCE = 'Web'¶
CHART_STYLE = <chartpy.style.Style object>¶
DEFAULT_PLOT_ENGINE = 'matplotlib'¶
SCALE_FACTOR = 3¶
plot_pnl(diff=True, silent_plot=False, reduce_plot=True)¶

Plots the profit and loss graph of the model. Returns the created Chart

diff

if you want to get the profit differences instead of raw values

silent_plot

if you want to only return the chart created

reduce_plot

when plotting many points use WebGl version of plotly if specified

plot_sharpe(silent_plot=False, reduce_plot=True)¶

Plots the sharpe ratio of the model Returns the created Chart

silent_plot

if you want to only return the chart created

reduce_plot:

when plotting many points use WebGl version of plotly if specified

plot_strategy_trade_notional(diff=True, silent_plot=False, reduce_plot=True)¶

Plots the notional trades of the model Returns the created Chart

diff

if you want to get the profit differences instead of raw values

silent_plot

if you want to only return the chart created

reduce_plot:

when plotting many points use WebGl version of plotly if specified
